channel.title: Japanese on faultint
channel.description: Recent content in Japanese on faultint

item.title: Kotoba Record - Episode 1
item.description: Learning a language is a long and boring process, especially if there is no visible reward. A record of what I have learned is something visually rewarding for me, so here are 10 japanese vocabularies that I learned. 1. 木陰 (こかげ) shade とても大きい木なので多くの人が木陰で涼んだりして、のんびり過ごしていました。 → Since the tree was very large, many people took shelter and rested in its shade. 2. 排泄物 (はいせつぶつ) excrement, waste 排泄物が活発に排出されるさま。 → Active excretion of waste.

item.title: JLPT Cope Messages
item.description: Messages I got from ChatGPT while talking about my Japanese learning journey.
